citations.narrative:
There is no inventory of animals available for USDA review at time of the inspection . The inventory must include
information regarding name /address/USDA license number of the person whom the animals were purchased or
otherwise acquired as well as offspring born of these animals. A current inventory must be available for USDA review .
CORRECT BY : 7/29/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There is no inventory of animals available for USDA review at time of the inspection . The inventory must include 
information regarding name /address/USDA license number of the person whom the animals were purchased or 
otherwise acquired as well as offspring born of these animals. A current inventory must be available for USDA review . 
CORRECT BY : 7/29/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
